title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Wise use of your negotiation skills can help land an aspiration. You have every right to state boldly what you want and to go after it. However, this is also true for someone who wants what they want and opposes your position. The bold Leo Moons friendly sextile with the diplomatic Libra Sun suggests that you can meet somewhere in the middle and not only get what you desire but jointly feel good about the deal. Nelson Mandela wrote, Our experience has taught us that with goodwill a negotiated solution can be found for even the most profound problems. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
